item.title: 阿布扎比今年首次 IPO 吸引 200 亿美元订单
item.description: 阿布扎比今年的首次公开募股吸引了 200 亿美元的订单，这表明海湾地区对上市的渴望依然健康。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s first initial public offering of the year drew in orders of $20 billion as appetite for listings in the Gulf remains healthy.】

item.title: 降息押注创造今年最长债券连胜纪录
item.description: 全球政府债券创下自 12 月以来最长的连涨记录，因为全球市场一致认为今年会有更多的降息举措。【原文：Global government bonds posted their longest rising streak since December, as the worldwide pendulum of market consensus swings toward more interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 习近平呼吁加强与美国大学的交流以促进两国关系
item.description: 据官方新华社报道，中国国家主席习近平呼吁中美两国大学加强交流，增进相互了解。【原文：China’s President Xi Jinping has called for more exchanges between Chinese and American universities to boost mutual understanding, according to the official Xinhua News Agency.】

item.title: 以色列面临因加沙战争而失去哥伦比亚煤炭供应的风险
item.description: 哥伦比亚贸易部呼吁限制向以色列出售煤炭，这是随着以色列在加沙行动中死亡人数上升而孤立这个犹太国家的最新举措。【原文：Colombia’s trade ministry is calling for a restriction on coal sales to Israel in the latest bid to isolate the Jewish state as the death toll rises in its Gaza campaign.】

item.title: 莫迪小胜加剧财政风险，印度央行可能按兵不动
item.description: 由于印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的执政党在大选中获胜乏力，引发了人们对财政民粹主义的担忧，印度央行可能会在今年相当长的时间内继续按兵不动。【原文：India’s central bank will likely keep interest rates on hold well into this year as a weak election win for Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s ruling party fans fears of fiscal populism.】

item.title: 美国就业数据公布前，金属从四周低点反弹
item.description: 在美国就业数据公布之前，铜引领工业金属价格反弹。【原文：Copper led industrial metals in a price rally ahead of US jobs data, that should inform the Federal Reserve’s next moves on interest rates.】

item.title: 台湾中央银行发出信号：通胀隐忧已逐渐消失
item.description: 台湾央行行长杨金龙（Yang Chin-long）表示，通胀对岛内经济的影响正在减弱。【原文：Taiwan central bank Governor Yang Chin-long indicated inflation is becoming less of a concern for the island’s economy, comments that come a week before a key decision on rates.】

item.title: 日本央行首席鸽派人士在下周会议前发出警告
item.description: 政策委员会的一位主要鸽派人士表示，鉴于近期的经济数据，日本央行维持当前的政策设定是合适的，因为薪资上涨对通胀的影响仍然微弱。【原文：It’s appropriate for the Bank of Japan to maintain its current policy settings in light of recent economic data, as the impact of rising pay on inflation remains weak, a leading dove on the policy board said.】

item.title: 担忧挥之不去，中国房地产股从五月高点下跌 20
item.description: 中国房地产股有望进入技术性熊市，因为市场对中国政府扶持房地产行业的努力仍心存疑虑。【原文：China’s property stocks are on track to enter a technical bear market as doubts remain on Beijing’s efforts to bolster the sector.】

item.title: 日元套利交易的风险吓不倒日本散户投资者
item.description: 印度和墨西哥的政治动荡未能阻止日本大批个人投资者押注新兴市场货币。【原文：Political shakeups in India and Mexico have failed to dissuade Japan’s large cohort of individual investors from betting on emerging-market currencies.】

item.title: 新加坡建筑商奥克斯寻求高达 1.2 亿美元的私人贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，资金紧张的新加坡房地产开发商奥克斯控股有限公司（Oxley Holdings Ltd）正在寻求 1 亿至 1.2 亿美元的私人信用贷款，部分用于偿还下个月到期的新加坡元债券。【原文：Oxley Holdings Ltd, a cash-strapped property developer in Singapore, is seeking a private credit loan of $100 million to $120 million partly to help repay a Singapore dollar bond due next month, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 莫迪获得联盟支持，印度股票期货上涨
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）赢得了其联盟中两个关键盟友的重要支持，从而得以组建政府并延长执政时间，印度股票期货因此上涨了 1%。【原文：India’s stock futures gained 1% after Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi won crucial backing from two key allies in his coalition, allowing him to form a government and extend his time in power.】

item.title: 三井住友考虑在印度低税中心扩大业务范围
item.description: 三井住友金融集团（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. is hiring for its planned outpost in India’s low-tax hub, joining a cluster of global banks placing a bet on the nation’s answer to Singapore and Dubai.】

item.title: 莫迪险胜后贝莱德继续看好印度债券
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）坚持其看好印度债券的观点，一扫市场对印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）以微弱优势赢得大选可能会刺激民粹主义消费的担忧。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is sticking to its bullish view on Indian bonds, brushing aside market concerns that Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s narrow election win may spur populist spending.】

item.title: 政治风险扼杀泰国债券，令全球基金保持警惕
item.description: 泰国一连串的政治风险让外国投资者对该国的债券保持谨慎，即使他们在 5 月份六个月来首次蹑手蹑脚地重返市场。【原文：A litany of political risks in Thailand are keeping foreign investors cautious of the nation’s bonds, even as they tiptoed back into the market in May for the first time in six months.】

item.title: 中国不断减少的 "雪球 "衍生品带来丰厚回报
item.description: 越来越多的中国指数挂钩衍生品（即雪球）投资者正在套现，就在监管机构试图控制这种广受欢迎但具有潜在风险的产品时，他们获得了收益。【原文：More investors in the Chinese index-linked derivatives known as snowballs are cashing in, reaping gains just as regulators are trying to rein in the popular but potentially risky products.】

item.title: 沙特释放需求担忧信号，石油仍延续涨势
item.description: 尽管沙特阿拉伯下调原油价格，表明对需求前景的担忧，但石油仍连续第二个交易日上涨。【原文：Oil rose for a second session even as Saudi Arabia signaled concerns over the demand outlook with cuts to its crude prices.】

item.title: 中国加快电网项目建设以跟上可再生能源蓬勃发展的步伐
item.description: 中国正在加大对电网基础设施的投资，以跟上可再生能源创纪录的蓬勃发展，这已使电网承受了前所未有的压力。【原文：China is ramping up investments in grid infrastructure to keep pace with a record-setting boom in renewables that has put the electricity network under unprecedented strain.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将开始减息，但之后的道路将更加迷茫
item.description: 欧洲中央银行准备开始将利率从历史高位下调，相信通货膨胀已得到充分控制，足以减轻经济负担。【原文：The European Central Bank is poised to start lowering interest rates from record highs, confident that inflation is sufficiently contained to ease the burden on the economy.】

item.title: 利马跑道变黑，引发秘鲁与航空公司之间的紧张关系
item.description: 秘鲁主要机场最近出现混乱，包括主跑道周日晚熄灯，而第二跑道仍无法使用，这让全球航空业大为光火，纷纷前往这个安第斯国家寻找答案。【原文：Recent chaos at Peru’s main airport, including the lights going out Sunday night on its main runway while the second runway remains inoperative, has the global airline industry fuming and heading to the Andean nation looking for answers.】

item.title: 美国债务负担加重给国债市场带来越来越大的风险
item.description: 债券业领袖认为，美国财政前景黯淡，债务将持续增长，长期国债收益率也将持续走高。【原文：Bond industry leaders see a bleak US fiscal outlook that will keep debt growing and sustain elevated long-dated Treasury yields.】
